name: Jack Primus and the Adventure of Tiny Things
name_original: Jack Primus and the Adventure of Tiny Things
description:
Jack Primus and the Adventure of Tiny Things is a game created by Team Quadratics as our first Ludum Dare game. We had a great time making this game, although we didn't include everything we wanted because of the time restraints. There may also be several issues, although hopefully none of them are too major. Note: Resolution changes near the beginning.

The controls are:
W - Jump
A - Left
D - Right
Space - Boomerang

Enjoy and good luck!

Developers:
Wizered67
Homerunbom12
